::Havoc/Repressor::

Havoc shakes his head. "I don't think Zardus would approve of us 
starting hostilities against any factions. We watch."

Repressor stands near him, ready to react if something happens.




--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Hot Rod::
> 
> He heard the comments from the other Maximals.
> "Heh heh. How fast the tables turn, with a new point of view."
> 
> ::Epyon::
> 
> He stands with out motion, in complete silence. Awaiting the 
response
> from Megaton.
> 
> ::Demolition::
> 
> He turned to Havoc,(The War Machines are still at CF right Yan?) 
after
> seeing the happanings with Megaton.
> "Do we help them?"
